traits.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The drow has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put Hanne to sleep.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, Hanne has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Shortsword
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: Ranged atk +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2 damage) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is also {@condition unconscious} while {@condition poisoned} in this way. The target wakes up if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it awake.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The drow's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 11}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
